DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC RIM TRADE ; TRANSPACIFIC SHIPPING
DOC.TEXT: Trade between Asia and the Americas evolved from silk and silver in the 17th Century to aircraft and automobiles today . Where once the routes were few and hazardous , plied by galleons and clippers , today they are countless and routine , plied by giant containers and supertankers . HISTORIC TRADE_ROUTES Circa A.D. 1600 Route : Manila to Acapulco to Callao , Peru . Major products : Silver from Mexico . Silk from China ; re-exported to Callao * Circa A.D. 1914 Route : Asia nations via Japan to North_America Major products : Cotton and tea from China . Rubber and tin from Sumatra and Malaya . Tea from Ceylon . Jute from India Route : New Zealand and Australia to North_America . Major products : Copper , dairy_products , wool , meat from Australia . Dairy_products and meat from New Zealand . Imports and Exports Commerce with United States for selected Pacific Rim nations in 1993 ( in billions ) : JAPAN Exports : $ 107.3 Imports : $ 47.9 Main exports : Autos , data-processors , integrated circuits , auto parts , telecommuncations equipment . Main imports : Aircraft / parts , wood , data-processors , integrated circuits , corn . * CHINA Exports : $ 31.5 Imports : $ 8.8 Main exports : Shoes , toys , carriages , sporting goods , women ' s coats , clothes , fabrics , suitcases . Main imports : Aircraft / parts , autos , telecommunications_equipment , measuring instruments , specialized machinery . * TAIWAN Exports : $ 25.1 Imports : $ 16.2 Main exports : Data processors , office machine parts , integrated circuits , toys , carriages , sporting goods , furniture . Main imports : Aircraft / parts , integrated circuits , autos , corn , oil seeds . * SOUTH_KOREA Exports : $ 17.1 Imports : $ 14.8 Main exports : Integrated circuits , data processors , shoes , office machine parts , autos . Main imports : Aircraft / parts , integrated circuits , animal hides , telecommunications_equipment , iron . * AUSTRALIA Exports : $ 8.2 Imports : $ 8.3 Main exports : Meat , aluminum , autos , wool . Main imports : Data processors , aircraft / parts , office machine parts , misc . low-value cargo , engines . Centuries of Shipping Some typical vessels : CHINESE JUNK Date : Mid-15th Century Length : 70 feet * SPANISH GALLEON Date : Early 1600s Length : 140 feet * STEAMSHIP Date : 1837 Length : 450 feet * CLIPPER_SHIP Date : 1869 Length : 435 feet * CONTAINER_SHIP Date : 20th Century Length : 754 feet * SUPERTANKER Date : 20th Century Length : 1 # 066 feet Sources : United States_Department of Commerce ; Worldport L.A. ; West Coast International Trade Market Share Analysis . Compiled by Times Researchers ANN GRIFFITH and JANET LUNDBLAD
